minecraft_map_artists.insight: Current scraper queries (AI tools, video generation, content strategy) do not surface Minecraft creators. Recommend adding search terms: 'Minecraft map', 'blockbench', 'world painter', 'Minecraft build', 'Minecraft cinematic'

high_activity.trend: Heavy usage for cinematic trailers, action scenes. SOUL 2.0 launched with free generations. Users pairing with Grok for script-to-video workflows.
